channel.title: Pages on NearTao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on NearTao's Blog

item.title: NearTao's Guide to the SP404-mk2
item.description:
I’ve been kicking around the idea of putting together a book for the mk2 for a while now, and figured it was taking enough shape that it was time to put a little something in place so people knew where to do to get access to it, give suggestions/corrections, or otherwise reach out. I’ll work to keep the newest version of the book available in the Guide History section.

It is going to take me a while to get everything in place for the book that I’d like, so please remember that this is a work in progress.

item.title: Permissions
item.description:
I am assuming you’ve reached this page because you found something that I posted online under the Creative Commons, and you’re looking for broader permissions to use something I made.

If you’re looking to contact me, for whatever reason, neartao@gmail.com is probably the easiest way to reach out to me.

item.title: Albums
item.description:
Stay tuned here… I’m not sure if I end up working through soundcloud or band camp at this time… but I’m going to get all my albums and experiments to date posted someplace.

Out From No Where

Putting this together has been a lot of fun, just getting back into making music. I’ve been playing around a lot, but the last nine (yeah nine) years has been taken up primarily with work, family, school. I wrapped up school last year and built out a unrealistically large Eurorack setup… and then promptly just played around for a year without actually making much of any music.

item.title: About
item.description:
Where you can find me:

Bandcamp, SoundCloud, YouTube

Twitter, Instagram

MPC Forums, STTB Forever, Muff Wiggler, OP-Forums

This site is totally an experiment for me at the moment… something that I started over eight years ago when I was having a really creative time doing artwork and music.  I wasn’t sure if I wanted to continue the original site, so I let it fall into tragic disrepair, and somebody bought the site name out from under me.  My fault… so I’ll deal with it, but now I need to take the time to get back to where I was.  At some point I’ll get this page along with others updated, but for now this is was it is.
